job_title: IT Project Manager with Pharma Domain
jd: From: Arun, Stellent IT arun@stellentit.com Reply to: arun@stellentit.com Hi FolksPlease find the job Description below and let me know your interest. You can share this job with your friend or colleagues who need it as well. Title: IT Project Manager with Pharma DomainLocation: Albany, NY-5 days a week onsite need local candidatesDuration: 6-month contractInterview: 2 rounds (virtual)Visa - US CITIZEN/ GREEN CARD / opt ead / h4ead / l2eadSummary - The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing, implementing, managing, and evaluating IT projects across our organization. In order to do this successfully, this person should feel comfortable handling multiple tasks at a time.Day to Day:Client is looking for an IT Project Manager for in Albany, NY. The New Technology Introduction Group for leading large scale issues and on-going projects across the GMP environment. This role will comprise of supporting full life cycle deployment within IT and identify areas for improvement, and ensuring all IT requirements are appropriately tracked. The team is looking for someone with a go-getter mentality and a solutions based thinking that can help drive the overall application development and infrastructure. Thanks & RegardsArun KumarSr. RecruiterEmail: Arun@stellentit.com
